full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## National Capital Region Temporary Help Services
### Supply Arrangement
#### Solicitation Number: S4514620

The Department of National Defense is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services through the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Details

* Solicitation Number: S4514620
* Solicitation Date: June 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2023, 3:00 PM (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 10, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: June 7, 2024
* Level of Security: Candidates being sought for this procurement must have a minimum clearance level of SECRET

## Procurement Details
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this project is the Department of National Defense. The contact information for the contracting entity is as follows:

* Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-971-7955

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the stream and category of Strategist.

## Supporting Documents
Download the Request for Proposal document at [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6699/s4514620-rfp.pdf).
